CustomField.formula:
CASE(LEN(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c)), 1, TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c),
2, TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c),
3, TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c),
4, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 1) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
5, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 2) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
6, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
7, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 1) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 2,3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
8, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 2) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3,3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
9, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 4,3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
10, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 1) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 2,3) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 5, 3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
11, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 2) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3,3) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 6, 3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3),
12, LEFT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 4,3) & " " & MID(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 7, 3) & " " & RIGHT(TEXT(ProductionTargetForCalc__c), 3), null) & CASE( MetricType__c, "COUNT", " ks", "SUM", " Kƒç", "")
CustomField.label: Production Target
